Instruction: In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt. Mix well.
Combine black beans, refried black beans, half of the reserved liquid, Mexican cheese, and garlic in an 8-inch baking dish.
Remove baking dish from oven and sprinkle with tortilla chips and additional cheese; return to oven and bake until chips are crispy and cheese is melted, about 10 minutes.
